menu.name: Pizza Margarita
menu.desc: Classic Margarita pizza with rich tomato sauce, melted cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

menu.name: Pizza Salami
menu.desc: Savory Salami pizza featuring spicy salami slices, gooey cheese, and zesty tomato sauce.

menu.name: Pizza Diavollo
menu.desc: Fiery Diavollo pizza topped with hot peppers, pepperoni, cheese, and a kick of chili flakes.

menu.name: Pizza Tuna
menu.desc: Delicious Tuna pizza with tuna chunks, melted cheese, and a blend of Italian spices.

menu.name: Pizza Bolonieze
menu.desc: Hearty Bolonieze pizza topped with minced meat, onions, bell peppers, and savory tomato sauce.

menu.name: Pizza Speciale
menu.desc: Specialty Speciale pizza with a medley of meats, cheese, olives, and a burst of flavorful sauces.

menu.name: Pizza Hawaii
menu.desc: Tropical Hawaii pizza with ham, pineapple, cheese, and a hint of barbecue sauce.

menu.name: Pizza Quadro Formacci
menu.desc: Quadro Formacci pizza featuring a blend of four cheeses, fresh basil, and tangy tomato sauce.

menu.name: Pizza Quadro Stagione
menu.desc: Quadro Stagione pizza with a mix of seasonal vegetables, cheese, and a drizzle of olive oil.

menu.name: Pizza Francesko
menu.desc: Francesko pizza loaded with fresh vegetables, olives, cheese, and aromatic Italian herbs.

menu.name: Coca Cola
menu.desc: Refreshing Coca Cola served ice-cold, perfect to quench your thirst and lift your spirits.

menu.name: Pepsi
menu.desc: Cool and fizzy Pepsi, a timeless cola drink that satisfies your craving for a classic taste.

menu.name: Sprite
menu.desc: Sprite, the lemon-lime soda with a burst of citrusy freshness, perfect for a tangy twist.

menu.name: Fanta
menu.desc: Fanta, the orange-flavored soda that brings a pop of fruity flavor and effervescent delight.

menu.name: Lemonade
menu.desc: Zesty Lemonade made with freshly squeezed lemons, sugar, and chilled water, a refreshing choice.

menu.name: Iced Tea
menu.desc: Iced Tea, a cool and invigorating blend of tea leaves, served with ice for a delightful experience.

menu.name: Orange Juice
menu.desc: Freshly squeezed Orange Juice, packed with vitamin C, offering a sweet and citrusy indulgence.

menu.name: Apple Juice
menu.desc: Pure Apple Juice, the essence of ripe apples in a glass, a natural and wholesome beverage.

menu.name: Mineral Water
menu.desc: Mineral Water, crisp and refreshing, sourced from natural springs to hydrate and revitalize.

menu.name: Milkshake
menu.desc: Creamy Milkshake blended with your favorite flavor, a luscious treat to satisfy your sweet tooth.

menu.name: Green Tea
menu.desc: Green Tea, a soothing and aromatic beverage with antioxidant properties, perfect for relaxation.

menu.name: Jasmine Tea
menu.desc: Jasmine Tea, fragrant and delicate, brewed to perfection, offering a floral note with every sip.

menu.name: Black Tea
menu.desc: Black Tea, bold and robust, with a deep flavor profile and a revitalizing kick to start your day.

menu.name: Hot Choco
menu.desc: Rich and velvety Hot Chocolate, indulgent and comforting, topped with a dollop of whipped cream.

menu.name: Americano
menu.desc: Americano, a strong and bold espresso-based coffee, perfect for coffee enthusiasts seeking a robust flavor.

menu.name: Espresso
menu.desc: Espresso, a concentrated shot of pure coffee essence, providing an intense and aromatic caffeine boost.
